body_html:
Minimal repro:

# From PyTorch 0.3
import torch

t = torch.zeros(4);
s1 = t.storage()[:2]
s2 = t.storage()[2:]
torch.save([s1, s2], 'foo.ser')

then:

# From master
import torch
torch.load("foo.ser")

body:
Minimal repro:

```
# From PyTorch 0.3
import torch

t = torch.zeros(4);
s1 = t.storage()[:2]
s2 = t.storage()[2:]
torch.save([s1, s2], 'foo.ser')
```

then:

```
# From master
import torch
torch.load("foo.ser")
```
